## About Our Presenter 

- [Emil Hvitfeldt](https://emilhvitfeldt.com/) is a Software Engineer at Posit PBC and proud co-author of [Supervised Machine Learning for Text Analysis with R](https://smltar.com/) with Julia Silge
<br><br>
- His interests include developing tools for natural language processing, machine learning using [tidymodels](https://www.tidymodels.org/), education, and the use of colors in data visualizations
